item.title: Version 1.5.2
item.description:
üöÄ What's New in 1.5.2

üìÖ Academic Planning & Syllabus

  • Syllabus Visual Guide: Added "Table of Contents" dotted leaders and interactive row-hover highlighting to make reading complex curriculum hierarchies effortless.
  • Intelligent Planning: Integrated real-time "Planning vs. Syllabus" coverage cards with exact "out of" counts for Topics and SLOs.
  • Global Logic: The system now enforces year-wide uniqueness, preventing the same topic from being planned twice across different weeks.
  • Total Pages: Automatic calculation and display of total subject pages based on chapter configurations.

üë®‚Äçüè´ Teacher & Workload Management

  • Redesigned Workload UI: Teacher assignments are now elegantly grouped by Classroom using the new TigleGroupedCard molecule.
  • Analytics Refinement: Replaced "Strength" with "Workload" (cumulative student count) while maintaining "Unique Reach" visibility in stat summaries.
  • Smart Constraints: Added validation to prevent logically conflicting assignments (e.g., assigning "General/All" alongside specific subjects).

üìä Data Integrity & Reporting

  • Clean Sweep Deletion: Deleting a Classroom now performs a full cascading purge of all associated Syllabus data, Weekly Plans, and History to prevent orphaned records.
  • Enhanced Audit Trails: Delivery review reports now explicitly list "Missed Topics" and their associated reasons in text exports.

‚ú® UI / UX & Design System

  • High-Alert Redesign: Fully overhauled destructive dialogs with a modern "Alert Container" style, centered typography, and high-contrast block actions.
  • Desktop Optimization: Standardized dialog widths and fixed "stretched" layouts on large monitors.
  • TigleKit Expansion: Migrated multiple application patterns into standard UI Kit molecules: TigleGroupedCard, TigleProgressCard, and TigleHierarchyPicker.

üõ†Ô∏è Bug Fixes

  • Fixed a layout crash in Stat Cards when used within scrollable horizontal rows.
  • Fixed hover highlights missing on sub-topics due to hit-test transparency.
  • Resolved an issue where Snackbars appeared behind modal editor sheets.
  • Fixed "Null check operator" crashes when viewing empty history detail headers.
